title: "AMD Targets High-End Signal Processing With New Versal Premium With AI Engines"
excerpt: "When compared to the previous generation Virtex UltraScale+ VU13, the Versal Premium VP2802 ACAP increases performance by 3.3x for RF signal processing, 4.7x for Radar data cube processing, and 5.8x for AI/ML inference processing while reducing the number of FPGAs needed for a design."
